name: Psorinum
Relationship: Complementary: SULPHUR.Compare: PEDICULUS - Head-louse - (psoric manifestations in children. Eruption on dorsum of hands, feet, neck. Prurigo; pellagra. Unusual aptitude for study and work). PEDICULUS (Cooties) transmit typhus and trench fever.) In lack of reaction compare CALCAREA and NATRUM ARS. GAERTNER. (Pessimistic, lack of confidence, subjective troublesome eye symptoms, fear of heights. Urticaria. Use 30th and 200th. (Wheeler.)
Modalities: Worse: coffee; psorinum patient does not improve while using coffee

Stool: Mucous, bloody, excessively fetid, dark fluid
Hard, difficult stool, with blood from rectum and burning piles
Constipation of infants, in pale, sickly scrofulous children
Head: Awakens at night with pain as from blow on head
Humid eruption on scalp; hair matted
Chronic headaches; hungry during attacks; with vertigo
Hammering pain; brain feels too large; worse, change of weather
Hair dry
Dull, pressive pain in occiput
Stomach: Very hungry always; must have something to eat in the middle of the night
Mouth: Tongue, gums ulcerated; tough mucus of foul taste adheres to soft palate
Respiratory: Asthma, with dyspnoea; worse, sitting up; better, lying down and keeping arms spread wide apart
Cough returns every winter, from suppressed eruption
Pain in chest; better, lying down
Dry, hard cough, with great weakness in chest
Nose: Dry, coryza, with stoppage of nose
Chronic catarrh; dropping from posterior nares
Ears: Raw, red, oozing scabs around ears
Most fetid pus from ears, brownish, offensive
Herpes from temples over ears to cheeks
Offensive discharge from eczema around ears
Female: Pimples oozing an acrid fluid that burns and excoriates the glands
Leucorrhoea fetid, lumpy, with much backache and debility
Skin: Sebaceous glands secrete excessively; oily skin
Indolent ulcers, slow to heal eczema behind ears
Herpetic eruptions, especially on scalp and bends of joints with itching; worse, from warmth of bed
Throat: Hawking up of cheesy, pea-like balls of disgusting smell and taste
Tonsils greatly swollen; painful swallowing, with pain in ears
Profuse, offensive saliva; tough mucus in throat
Extremities: Weakness of joints, as if they would not hold together

details: The therapeutic field of this remedy is found in so-called psoric manifestations. Psorinum is a cold medicine; wants the head kept warm, WANTS WARM CLOTHING even in summer. EXTREME SENSITIVENESS TO COLD. DEBILITY, independent of any organic disease, especially the weakness remaining after acute disease. LACK OF REACTION, i.e. phagocytes defective; when well-chosen remedies fail to act. Scrofulous patients. Secretions HAVE A FILTHY SMELL. Profuse sweating. Cardiac weakness. Skin symptoms very prominent. Often gives immunity from cold-catching. Easy perspiration when walking. Syphilis, inherited and tertiary. OFFENSIVE DISCHARGES.
dosage: Two hundredth and higher potencies. Should not be repeated too often. PSORINUM requires something like 9 days before it manifests its action, and even a single dose may elicit other symptoms
